privacy.title: Privacy & Data Control
privacy.subtitle: Manage your personal data and privacy settings
privacy.rightsDescription: Under GDPR and privacy regulations, you have the following rights
privacy.rightToAccessDesc: You can request a copy of all personal data we hold about you.
privacy.rightToErasureDesc: You can request deletion of your personal data, subject to legal requirements.
privacy.rightToPortabilityDesc: You can receive your data in a machine-readable format.
privacy.exportDataDesc: Download a complete copy of your personal information
privacy.exportDataDetails: This will include your profile information, applications, documents metadata, payment history, and activity logs. The data will be provided in JSON format.
privacy.exportSuccess: Your data has been exported successfully and downloaded to your device.
privacy.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently remove your account and associated data
privacy.deleteWarningText: This action cannot be undone. Some data may be retained for legal and compliance purposes.
privacy.deleteAccountInfo: When you delete your account, you can choose what happens to your data:
privacy.deleteProfileInfo: Your profile will be permanently deleted
privacy.deleteApplicationsInfo: Applications may be deleted or anonymized based on your choice
privacy.deleteLogsInfo: Audit logs will be anonymized for security purposes
privacy.confirmDeletionDesc: This is a permanent action. Please review your options carefully.
privacy.accountWillBeDeleted: Your account will be permanently deleted.
privacy.deleteAllApplications: Delete all my applications (otherwise they will be anonymized)

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and get the support you need
help.gettingStartedDesc: New to Campus Haiti? Learn how to create an account and submit your first application.
help.contactSupportDesc: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
help.q1: How do I apply to universities?
help.a1Intro: To apply to universities through Campus Haiti:
help.a1Step1: Create an account and sign in
help.a1Step2: Complete your profile with personal information
help.a1Step6: Submit your application and track its status
help.a2Intro: We accept two secure payment methods:
help.a2Stripe: Stripe: Credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express)
help.a2MonCash: MonCash: Mobile money for local payments in Haiti
help.a2Security: All transactions are encrypted and secure.
help.q3: How do I track my application status?
help.a3Step2: View all your applications in one place
help.a3Step3: See real-time status updates (Submitted, Under Review, Accepted, Rejected)
help.a3Step4: Receive email notifications for important updates
help.a3Step5: Access additional information or requirements from universities
help.a4Doc1: Copy of valid ID or passport
help.a4Note: Specific requirements may vary by university and program.
help.q5: Can I apply to multiple universities?
help.a5Intro: Yes! One of the main benefits of Campus Haiti is the ability to apply to multiple universities and programs with a single application. You can:
help.a5Benefit1: Select as many programs as you want
help.a5Benefit2: Reuse your profile and documents across applications
help.a5Benefit3: Pay all fees in one transaction
help.a5Benefit4: Track all applications from one dashboard
help.q6: How long does the application process take?
help.a6Completing: Completing application: 30-60 minutes if you have all documents ready
help.a6Review: University review: Typically 2-6 weeks, depending on the institution
help.a6Decision: Admission decision: You'll be notified via email and dashboard

partners.title: Partners
partners.partnerUniversitiesDesc: We partner with leading universities across Haiti to streamline the application process.
partners.becomePartnerDesc: Interested in partnering with Campus Haiti? Contact us to learn more about how we can work together.

settings.demoModeMessage: You're viewing sample settings. Changes cannot be saved in demo mode. Please

settings.manageSettings: Manage your university profile and payment settings
settings.configurePayments: Configure how you receive application fees
settings.stripeDescription: Connect your Stripe account to accept international payments
settings.stripeExplanation: Connect your Stripe account to receive payments via credit card from applicants worldwide. Stripe handles all compliance and transfers funds directly to your bank account.
settings.monCashDescription: Connect MonCash to accept local mobile payments in Haiti
settings.monCashExplanation: Connect your MonCash account to accept payments from applicants in Haiti using mobile money.
settings.bankAccountDescription: Add your bank account to receive direct payments
settings.manageTeam: Manage who can access and manage your university account
settings.teamMemberPermissions: Team members will be able to view applications, manage programs, and configure settings
settings.teamFeatureDescription: The ability to add team members and manage permissions is coming soon.
